thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
Our financial services company has been using the Servcorp Service for about 14 months and I found the supporting staff are consistently well presented, attentive and competent as an extension of business operations and culture.
The value proposition has been totally transparent with no surprises in terms of cost and and delivery of service. This has allowed me to focus on the importance of building my business rather than just maintaining its day to day tasks.
Seriously, anyone considering it ...its well worth it !
